raw_body: PREMLATHA (MERLE) WEERASINGHE, Wife of late G.D.C. Weerasinghe, darling mother of Savithri, mother-in-law of Vasantha Wijesekera, darling grandmother of Kavindi and Vichalya Fernando and Ramaala Wijesekera, beloved sister of Chandrasoma and Sarath Rajapakse and of late Sirimanne, Preethi, Vijitha and Anura Rajapakse. Remains will lie at “The Restpect Home” by Jayaratne’s. Cremation on 18th March 2024 at 12.30 p.m. at the New Crematorium, General Cemetery, Borella.                   019527
